izzy.classification.roc¶

izzy.classification.roc(y_true, y_prob, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

Compute false positive rates and true positives rates for the receiver operating characteristic

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_prob (ArrayLike) – Predicted outcomes expressed as probabilities

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight of observations

Returns

False positive rates and true positive rates

Return type

tuple of numpy.ndarray

Previous topic

izzy.classification.recall

Next topic

izzy.classification.roc_auc
